lyrics.text:
Man you gotta listen
Turn my tweets into the vision
Turn my dreams into the mission
Cooking beats inside the kitchen
Unlimited ammunition
& gimme a couple wishes
I’ll prolly get a Gundam
To bundle up all riches
The keys to success is in flipping a couple switches
Taking a couple risks and
Dropping a couple of bitches
Throwing a couple of pitches
Taking a couple pictures 
and trying to decide if you spike or is you vicious   

Mastering my bankai like I’m Ichigo
Don’t rush to find the answers even if this world acts like we should know
Don’t stress about the past - not even a week ago
I’m Rita with the staff, I’mma  focus on how we can grow
Get up off your ass, let’s see how far that we can go
Don’t shatter like a glass, let’s try to make the speakers blow
My nigga what’s the rush, you don’t gotta go fast
Sometimes you gotta charge it up like a ki blast

Life is like a spirit bomb, charging up by others
We can reach full power with the right brothers and mothers
Amaterasu, the fire of a hundred Summers
Just know that you worth isn’t determined by a number
Hoes on my dick like I unlocked my Byakugan
I mean I did, but that’s not what this is about
Word of advice, stop chasing the clout
Word of advice, look for another route 
Word of advice, don’t take my advice
Play another song, maybe play something nice
Maybe hop on a Lapras, and shoot a beam of ice
Make your own path, or you’ll pay the price
You don’t gotta rap, you don’t gotta make beats
Don’t try be Black Dave, you don’t wanna be me
You don’t gotta be liked, I mean this isn’t IG
If you can be yourself you can truly be free
